mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATMESSAGE (M_NUM, ROOM_ID, TIME, MESSAGE, ATTFILE, G_NUM, CM_NUM) VALUES (1, (SELECT MAX(ROOM_ID) FROM CHATROOM), SYSDATE, #{message}, '첨부파일', 1, CM_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET CONTENT = '자리비움' WHERE M_NUM = 1
mapper.select: SELECT C.M_NUM, C.ROOM_ID, TO_CHAR(C.TIME, 'AM HH12:MI'), C.MESSAGE, C.ATTFILE, C.G_NUM, C.CM_NUM, G.G_NUM, G.ID, G.PASSWORD, G.G_NAME, G.ADDRESS, G.EMAIL, G.PHONE, G.REGDATE, M.M_NUM, M.C_NUM, M.G_NUM, M.AUTHORITY, M.ROLE, M.D_NUM, M.CONTENT FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M, CHATMESSAGE C WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND C.M_NUM = M.M_NUM ORDER BY C.TIME
SELECT * FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM
SELECT * FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM
SELECT * FROM GUEST G, MEMBER M WHERE G.G_NUM = M.G_NUM AND G_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{searchMember} ||'%' ORDER BY G_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATJOINER VALUES (CJ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(ROOM_ID) FROM CHATROOM), 1)
